Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Dating: NEW KINGDOM (not after); MIDDLE KINGDOM (not before)
Name: Pawn
Description: Small damaged cylindrical pawn with a rounded conical tip. The material, limestone, is extremely friable. The game piece is white in colour, but was probably covered with a golden colouring, traces of which are still visible.
